---
listing:
  contents: posts/**/*.qmd
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [date, title, reading-time, description, categories]
  feed: true
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
css: |
  .blog-listing {
    max-width: 800px; /* Set the maximum width of the content */
    margin: 0 auto; /* Center the content horizontally */
  }

  .blog-post {
    margin-bottom: 30px; /* Add some space between each blog post */
  }
---
